name: boltz2_docking
description: Perform protein-ligand docking via Boltz-2: input a protein sequence plus one or more ligands (SMILES), get back predicted structures and confidence scores.

sequence.description: One-letter amino acid sequence of the target protein (FASTA format, without header).

ligands.description: List of ligand definitions to dock against the protein.

sampling_steps.description: Number of sampling steps for diffusion process.

diffusion_samples.description: How many diffusion-sampled structures to generate.

step_scale.description: Scaling factor for diffusion step size.

use_potentials.description: If true, omit external force-field potentials from the diffusion process.

return_structure.description: If false, the predicted structure will not be read or returned. Defaults to false.

predicted_structure.description: The predicted protein-ligand complex structure in CIF format.

structure_format.description: Format of the structure file (typically 'cif') if structure is returned.

structure_error.description: Error message if structure file is missing.

affinity_prediction.description: JSON object containing affinity predictions and related data.

affinity_error.description: Error message if affinity file is missing.
